contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox historic subdivision | Start= 1900 | End= 1965 | Map= [[Image:LondonMBWoolwich.png|Metropolitan Borough of Woolwich shown within the County of London]]<br>''Woolwich within the County of London'' | Name= Woolwich | Government= Woolwich Borough Council | Status= [[Metropolitan boroughs of the County of London|Metropolitan borough]] | HQ= Wellington Street | Replace= [[Royal Borough of Greenwich]]<br>[[London Borough of Newham]] | Arms= [[Image:Woolwich-arms.png|150px|Arms of Woolwich Metropolitan Borough Council]]<br>''Coat of arms of the borough council'' | Motto= Clamant nostra tela in Regis querela<br>(Our weapons clash in the King's quarrel) | Image= [[Image:Woolwich town hall 1.jpg|250px]]<br>''Woolwich Town Hall'' }} The '''Metropolitan Borough of Woolwich''' was a [[Metropolitan boroughs of the County of London|Metropolitan borough]] in the [[County of London]] from 1900 to 1965. ==Formation== The borough was formed from the [[civil parishes in England|civil parish]]es (with previous local authority): *[[Eltham, London|Eltham]] ([[Lee District (Metropolis)|Lee District Board of Works]]) *[[Plumstead]] (vestry) *[[Woolwich]] (vestry) ==Area and population== The area of the borough varied between 8,277 and {{convert|8282|acre|km2|1}}. The population, as recorded at the census, was:<ref name="ReferenceA">Statistical Abstract for London, 1901 (Vol. IV).</ref> '''Civil Parish 1801-1899''' {| class="wikitable" ! Year<ref name="ReferenceA"/> || 1801 || 1811 ||1821 || 1831 || 1841 || 1851 || 1861 || 1871 || 1881 || 1891 |- ! Population || 12,619|| 20,983||21,277||22,411||30,787|| 43,177|| 69,064|| 67,880|| 74,963|| 98,966 |} '''Metropolitan Borough 1900-1961''' {| class="wikitable" ! Year|| 1901 || 1911 || 1921 || 1931 || 1941 || 1951 || 1961 |- ! Population ||117,178||121,376||140,389|| 146,881||<ref>''The census was suspended for [[World War II]]</ref>|| 147,891||146,603 |} ==Abolition== Most of it was amalgamated with the [[Metropolitan Borough of Greenwich]] to form the [[Royal Borough of Greenwich|London Borough of Greenwich]], but small parts north of the river, including [[North Woolwich]], were instead included in the [[London Borough of Newham]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{London Government Act 1963}} {{coord|51.4896|0.0647|type:adm3rd_region:GB-GRE|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Woolwich}} [[Category:Metropolitan boroughs of the County of London]] [[Category:History of Greenwich]] [[Category:1900 establishments in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:1965 disestablishments]] [[Category:Woolwich]] [[Category:Districts abolished by the London Government Act 1963]] {{London-geo-stub}}
